name: Crossrush BETA
description:
NOTE - WEB VERSION DOES NOT SUPPORT RESOLUTION OR FULLSCREEN, SO THEY WILL NOT WORK AS INTENDED ON THE WEBSITE, CONSIDER DOWNLOADING THE FILES INSTEAD.

A speedrunning game based on traversing the environment within a level system.

So far, the game is in early development but I am planning to add features such as:

  • Gun Pickup/Drop
  • Smoothing out features that are gimmicky right now
  • Improving UI elements
  • Optimising performance
  • Improving graphics
  • Making the overall game more enjoyable and replayable
  • A vast number of levels.
